LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.label: shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.label: smokepop belt
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.description: An automatic defensive smokescreen. It will release a thick cloud of smoke if the wearer is hit by a projectile, providing line-of-sight cover and preventing turrets from locking on. Single-use.
